    for SRel :: "('procS \<times> 'procS) set"
    and TRel :: "('procT \<times> 'procT) set"

  target: "(T1, T2) \<in> TRel \<Longrightarrow> (TargetTerm T1, TargetTerm T2) \<in> indRelST SRel TRel"

text \<open>If the relations indRelRST, indRelLST, or indRelST contain a pair of target terms, then
        this pair is also related by the considered target term relation. Similarly a pair of
        source terms is related by the considered source term relation.\<close>

text \<open>If the relations indRelRSTPO or indRelLSTPO contain a pair of target terms, then this pair
        is also related by the transitive closure of the considered target term relation. Similarly
        a pair of source terms is related by the transitive closure of the source term relation. A
        pair of a source and a target term results from the combination of pairs in the source
        relation, the target relation, and the encoding function. Note that, because of the
        symmetry, no similar condition holds for indRelSTEQ.\<close>

lemma (in encoding) indRelRSTPO_to_SRel_and_TRel:
  fixes SRel :: "('procS \<times> 'procS) set"
    and TRel :: "('procT \<times> 'procT) set"
    and P Q  :: "('procS, 'procT) Proc"
  assumes "P \<lesssim>\<lbrakk>\<cdot>\<rbrakk>R<SRel,TRel> Q"
  shows "\<forall>SP SQ. SP \<in>S P \<and> SQ \<in>S Q \<longrightarrow> (SP, SQ) \<in> SRel\<^sup>+"
    and "\<forall>SP TQ. SP \<in>S P \<and> TQ \<in>T Q \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>S. (SP, S) \<in> SRel\<^sup>* \<and> (\<lbrakk>S\<rbrakk>, TQ) \<in> TRel\<^sup>*)"
    and "\<forall>TP SQ. TP \<in>T P \<and> SQ \<in>S Q \<longrightarrow> False"
    and "\<forall>TP TQ. TP \<in>T P \<and> TQ \<in>T Q \<longrightarrow> (TP, TQ) \<in> TRel\<^sup>+"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<forall>SP SQ.
        SP \<in>S P \<and> SQ \<in>S Q \<longrightarrow>
        (SP, SQ) \<in> SRel\<^sup>+ &&&
     \<forall>SP TQ.
        SP \<in>S P \<and> TQ \<in>T Q \<longrightarrow>
        (\<exists>S.
            (SP, S) \<in> SRel\<^sup>* \<and>
            (\<lbrakk>S\<rbrakk>, TQ) \<in> TRel\<^sup>*)) &&&
    \<forall>TP SQ.
       TP \<in>T P \<and> SQ \<in>S Q \<longrightarrow> False &&&
    \<forall>TP TQ.
       TP \<in>T P \<and> TQ \<in>T Q \<longrightarrow>
       (TP, TQ) \<in> TRel\<^sup>+
using assms

       (\<exists>S.

    \<forall>TP SQ.

       SQ \<in>S TargetTerm T2 \<longrightarrow>
       False

lemma (in encoding) indRelLSTPO_to_SRel_and_TRel:
  fixes SRel :: "('procS \<times> 'procS) set"
    and TRel :: "('procT \<times> 'procT) set"

  assumes "P \<lesssim>\<lbrakk>\<cdot>\<rbrakk>L<SRel,TRel> Q"
  shows "\<forall>SP SQ. SP \<in>S P \<and> SQ \<in>S Q \<longrightarrow> (SP, SQ) \<in> SRel\<^sup>+"
    and "\<forall>SP TQ. SP \<in>S P \<and> TQ \<in>T Q \<longrightarrow> False"
    and "\<forall>TP SQ. TP \<in>T P \<and> SQ \<in>S Q \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>S. (TP, \<lbrakk>S\<rbrakk>) \<in> TRel\<^sup>* \<and> (S, SQ) \<in> SRel\<^sup>*)"

        source term and target term relations.\<close>

      and sourceInRel:  "\<forall>S1 S2. (S1, S2) \<in> SRel \<longrightarrow> (SourceTerm S1, SourceTerm S2) \<in> Rel"
  shows "rel_preserves_barbs SRel SWB"

text \<open>If indRelRSTPO, indRelLSTPO, or indRelSTPO reflects barbs then so do the corresponding
        source term and target term relations.\<close>

lemma (in encoding_wrt_barbs) rel_with_source_impl_SRel_reflects_barbs:
  fixes SRel :: "('procS \<times> 'procS) set"
    and Rel  :: "(('procS, 'procT) Proc \<times> ('procS, 'procT) Proc) set"
  assumes reflection: "rel_reflects_barbs Rel (STCalWB SWB TWB)"
      and sourceInRel:  "\<forall>S1 S2. (S1, S2) \<in> SRel \<longrightarrow> (SourceTerm S1, SourceTerm S2) \<in> Rel"
  shows "rel_reflects_barbs SRel SWB"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_reflects_binary_pred SRel (\<lambda>b. hasBarb b SWB)
proof clarify

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b x.
       (a, b) \<in> SRel \<and> b\<down><SWB>x \<Longrightarrow>
       a\<down><SWB>x
fix SP SQ a

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b x.
       (a, b) \<in> SRel \<and> b\<down><SWB>x \<Longrightarrow>
       a\<down><SWB>x
assume "(SP, SQ) \<in> SRel"

proof (state)
this:
  (SP, SQ) \<in> SRel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b x.
       (a, b) \<in> SRel \<and> b\<down><SWB>x \<Longrightarrow>
       a\<down><SWB>x
with sourceInRel

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>S1 S2.
     (S1, S2) \<in> SRel \<longrightarrow>
     (SourceTerm S1, SourceTerm S2) \<in> Rel
  (SP, SQ) \<in> SRel
have "(SourceTerm SP, SourceTerm SQ) \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>S1 S2.
     (S1, S2) \<in> SRel \<longrightarrow>
     (SourceTerm S1, SourceTerm S2) \<in> Rel
  (SP, SQ) \<in> SRel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (SourceTerm SP, SourceTerm SQ) \<in> Rel
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  (SourceTerm SP, SourceTerm SQ) \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b x.
       (a, b) \<in> SRel \<and> b\<down><SWB>x \<Longrightarrow>
       a\<down><SWB>x
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  (SourceTerm SP, SourceTerm SQ) \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b x.
       (a, b) \<in> SRel \<and> b\<down><SWB>x \<Longrightarrow>
       a\<down><SWB>x
assume "SQ\<down><SWB>a"

proof (state)
this:
  SQ\<down><SWB>a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b x.
       (a, b) \<in> SRel \<and> b\<down><SWB>x \<Longrightarrow>
       a\<down><SWB>x
hence "SourceTerm SQ\<down>.a"

proof (prove)
using this:
  SQ\<down><SWB>a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<exists>S. S \<in>S SourceTerm SQ \<and> S\<down><SWB>a) \<or>
    (\<exists>T. T \<in>T SourceTerm SQ \<and> T\<down><TWB>a)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  (\<exists>S. S \<in>S SourceTerm SQ \<and> S\<down><SWB>a) \<or>
  (\<exists>T. T \<in>T SourceTerm SQ \<and> T\<down><TWB>a)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b x.
       (a, b) \<in> SRel \<and> b\<down><SWB>x \<Longrightarrow>
       a\<down><SWB>x
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (SourceTerm SP, SourceTerm SQ) \<in> Rel
  (\<exists>S. S \<in>S SourceTerm SQ \<and> S\<down><SWB>a) \<or>
  (\<exists>T. T \<in>T SourceTerm SQ \<and> T\<down><TWB>a)
have "SourceTerm SP\<down>.a"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (SourceTerm SP, SourceTerm SQ) \<in> Rel
  (\<exists>S. S \<in>S SourceTerm SQ \<and> S\<down><SWB>a) \<or>
  (\<exists>T. T \<in>T SourceTerm SQ \<and> T\<down><TWB>a)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<exists>S. S \<in>S SourceTerm SP \<and> S\<down><SWB>a) \<or>
    (\<exists>T. T \<in>T SourceTerm SP \<and> T\<down><TWB>a)
using reflection reflection_of_barbs_in_barbed_encoding[where Rel="Rel"]

proof (prove)
using this:
  (SourceTerm SP, SourceTerm SQ) \<in> Rel
  (\<exists>S. S \<in>S SourceTerm SQ \<and> S\<down><SWB>a) \<or>
  (\<exists>T. T \<in>T SourceTerm SQ \<and> T\<down><TWB>a)
  rel_reflects_binary_pred Rel (\<lambda>b. hasBarb b (STCalWB SWB TWB))
  rel_reflects_binary_pred Rel
   (\<lambda>b. hasBarb b (STCalWB SWB TWB)) \<and>
  (?P, ?Q) \<in> Rel \<and>
  ((\<exists>S. S \<in>S ?Q \<and> S\<down><SWB>?a) \<or>
   (\<exists>T. T \<in>T ?Q \<and> T\<down><TWB>?a)) \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<exists>S. S \<in>S ?P \<and> S\<down><SWB>?a) \<or>
  (\<exists>T. T \<in>T ?P \<and> T\<down><TWB>?a)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<exists>S. S \<in>S SourceTerm SP \<and> S\<down><SWB>a) \<or>
    (\<exists>T. T \<in>T SourceTerm SP \<and> T\<down><TWB>a)
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  (\<exists>S. S \<in>S SourceTerm SP \<and> S\<down><SWB>a) \<or>
  (\<exists>T. T \<in>T SourceTerm SP \<and> T\<down><TWB>a)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b x.
       (a, b) \<in> SRel \<and> b\<down><SWB>x \<Longrightarrow>
       a\<down><SWB>x
thus "SP\<down><SWB>a"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<exists>S. S \<in>S SourceTerm SP \<and> S\<down><SWB>a) \<or>
  (\<exists>T. T \<in>T SourceTerm SP \<and> T\<down><TWB>a)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. SP\<down><SWB>a
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  SP\<down><SWB>a

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

  assumes reflection: "rel_weakly_reflects_barbs Rel (STCalWB SWB TWB)"
      and sourceInRel:  "\<forall>S1 S2. (S1, S2) \<in> SRel \<longrightarrow> (SourceTerm S1, SourceTerm S2) \<in> Rel"
  shows "rel_weakly_reflects_barbs SRel SWB"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_weakly_reflects_barbs SRel SWB
proof clarify

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b x P'.
       (a, b) \<in> SRel \<and>
       b \<longmapsto>Calculus SWB* P' \<and>

fix SP SQ a SQ'

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (chain)
picking this:

  (SP, SQ) \<in> SRel
have "(SourceTerm SP, SourceTerm SQ) \<in> Rel"

moreover

proof (state)

  (SourceTerm SP, SourceTerm SQ) \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b x P'.

       a\<Down><SWB>x
assume "SQ \<longmapsto>(Calculus SWB)* SQ'" and "SQ'\<down><SWB>a"

this:
  SQ \<longmapsto>Calculus SWB* SQ'
  SQ'\<down><SWB>a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b x P'.
       (a, b) \<in> SRel \<and>

proof (prove)
using this:

text \<open>If indRelRSTPO, indRelLSTPO, or indRelSTPO respects barbs then so do the corresponding
        source term and target term relations.\<close>

lemma (in encoding_wrt_barbs) indRelRSTPO_impl_SRel_and_TRel_respect_barbs:
  fixes SRel :: "('procS \<times> 'procS) set"
    and TRel :: "('procT \<times> 'procT) set"
  assumes respection: "rel_respects_barbs (indRelRSTPO SRel TRel) (STCalWB SWB TWB)"
  shows "rel_respects_barbs SRel SWB"
    and "rel_respects_barbs TRel TWB"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_respects_binary_pred SRel (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a SWB) &&&
    rel_respects_binary_pred TRel (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a TWB)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. rel_respects_binary_pred SRel (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a SWB)
 2. rel_respects_binary_pred TRel (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a TWB)
show "rel_respects_barbs SRel SWB"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_respects_binary_pred SRel (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a SWB)

using respection
            indRelRSTPO_impl_SRel_and_TRel_preserve_barbs(1)[where SRel="SRel" and TRel="TRel"]
            indRelRSTPO_impl_SRel_and_TRel_reflect_barbs(1)[where SRel="SRel" and TRel="TRel"]

proof (prove)
using this:
  rel_respects_binary_pred (indRelRSTPO SRel TRel)
   (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a (STCalWB SWB TWB))
  rel_preserves_binary_pred (indRelRSTPO SRel TRel)
   (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a (STCalWB SWB TWB)) \<Longrightarrow>
  rel_preserves_binary_pred SRel (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a SWB)
  rel_reflects_binary_pred (indRelRSTPO SRel TRel)
   (\<lambda>b. hasBarb b (STCalWB SWB TWB)) \<Longrightarrow>
  rel_reflects_binary_pred SRel (\<lambda>b. hasBarb b SWB)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_respects_binary_pred SRel (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a SWB)
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  rel_respects_binary_pred SRel (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a SWB)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_respects_binary_pred TRel (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a TWB)
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_respects_binary_pred TRel (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a TWB)
show "rel_respects_barbs TRel TWB"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_respects_binary_pred TRel (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a TWB)

using respection
            indRelRSTPO_impl_SRel_and_TRel_preserve_barbs(2)[where SRel="SRel" and TRel="TRel"]
            indRelRSTPO_impl_SRel_and_TRel_reflect_barbs(2)[where SRel="SRel" and TRel="TRel"]

proof (prove)
using this:
  rel_respects_binary_pred (indRelRSTPO SRel TRel)
   (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a (STCalWB SWB TWB))
  rel_preserves_binary_pred (indRelRSTPO SRel TRel)
   (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a (STCalWB SWB TWB)) \<Longrightarrow>
  rel_preserves_binary_pred TRel (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a TWB)
  rel_reflects_binary_pred (indRelRSTPO SRel TRel)
   (\<lambda>b. hasBarb b (STCalWB SWB TWB)) \<Longrightarrow>
  rel_reflects_binary_pred TRel (\<lambda>b. hasBarb b TWB)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_respects_binary_pred TRel (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a TWB)
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  rel_respects_binary_pred TRel (\<lambda>a. hasBarb a TWB)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

  fixes SRel :: "('procS \<times> 'procS) set"

  assumes rel:   "P \<lesssim>\<lbrakk>\<cdot>\<rbrakk>RT<TRel> Q"
      and reflS: "refl SRel"
  shows "P \<lesssim>\<lbrakk>\<cdot>\<rbrakk>R<SRel,TRel> Q"
